title: What are the basic assumptions of classical and new classical macroeconomics schools? Discuss the difference and similarities of these schools. - Quora

response.answer_text: The primary difference in “macroeconomics” between classical and “new” classical macroeconomics is the realization fiat money is not tied to any commodity whatsoever. Stamping 100 zacks on a gold coin that contains only 50 zacks of gold is still done by the sovereign. But the gold has been dispensed with.
